name: 8-O-methyldihydrosterigmatocystin,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (aflatoxin-B forming)
definition: Dihydro-O-methylsterigmatocystin + 2 [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + 2 Oxygen <=> Aflatoxin B2 + 2 [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + H2O + Methanol + CO2
